description: This script verifies that specific FastAPI endpoints (/health and /debug/config) return HTTP 200 responses without requiring a database connection. It performs HTTP GET requests to these endpoints on a local server and checks their responses and payloads, ensuring they behave as expected in environments where the database may be unreachable.

methods.name: int _port()
methods.description: Retrieves the port number from the PORT environment variable, defaulting to 3001 if unset or invalid.

methods.name: None _check(path: str)
methods.description: Connects to the specified path on localhost:port, verifies the response is HTTP 200, and performs additional checks for the /health endpoint payload.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main execution function that runs the checks on /health and /debug/config, printing success message upon completion.
